full_summary:
******************************
**Government Tender Announcement**
******************************
### Solicitation Title
Cartridge, 9mm JHP 147gr Ammunition

### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-259903/A
* **Publication Date**: 2024-10-29
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-12-12T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2025-03-12
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-08-27
* **Tender Status**: Open

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Procurement Category
* **Category**: Goods
* **UNSPSC Code**: 46101601 - Defense or law enforcement ammunition

### Delivery and Schedule
* **Firm Quantity**: 600,000 cartridges to be delivered to Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn, Saskatchewan on or before 2025-12-01.
* **400,000 cartridges to be delivered to CFAD Angus, Milton, Ontario on or before 2025-12-01.**
* **Optional Quantity (to be discussed)**: 600,000 cartridges to be delivered to CFAD Dundurn between 2027-06-01 and 2027-08-01; 400,000 cartridges to be delivered to CFAD Angus, Milton, Ontario between 2027-06-01 and 2027-08-01.

### Security Requirements and Controlled Goods
* **No security requirements associated with this procurement.**
* **Procurement subject to the Controlled Goods Program.**

### Contracting Entity
* **Contracting Entity Name**: DGLEPM/DLP
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2, Canada

### Contact Information
* **Name**: Trevor Clark
* **Email**: [Trevor.Clark@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Trevor.Clark@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 698-5046

### Attachment
A comprehensive tender description in PDF format is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50211/rfp---w8486-259903---cartridge%2C-9mm
